name: PAT_ENC_6
description: This table supplements the PAT_ENC, PAT_ENC_2, PAT_ENC_3, PAT_ENC_4, and PAT_ENC_5  tables. It contains additional information related to patient encounters or appointments.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: PAT_ENC_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: LINKED_ENC_CSN
columns.description: The unique contact serial number of the visit that represents the official visit. Intended for (FINLAND) ad hoc encounters that need to be associated with an official visit.

columns.name: LMP_PRECISION_C_NAME
columns.description: The uncertainty of the last menstrual period date stored in the PAT_ENC.LMP_DATE column.

columns.name: PLANNED_BILL_AREA_ID
columns.description: Used to track what the bill area was for an appointment at the time of check in.

columns.name: PLANNED_BILL_AREA_ID_BILL_AREA_NAME
columns.description: The record name of this bill area, financial subdivision, or financial division.

columns.name: BCRA_BRCA_GENE_MUT_C_NAME
columns.description: The patient's risk factor category number for the Presence of BRCA 1/2 Mutation breast cancer risk factor.

columns.name: SVC_TARGET_EFFORT_YN
columns.description: Flag to indicate that additional effort was needed on behalf of staff to work this encounter in order to meet service targets.

columns.name: OUTPAT_VISIT_GRP_C_NAME
columns.description: Used to indicate additional visit type information for reporting purposes.

columns.name: PSYCH_ARRIVAL_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the method of arrival for the patient for psychiatric care.

columns.name: PLAN_RECUR_TREAT_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the visit is part of a planned recurring treatment period.

columns.name: HUS_VISIT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: Additional visit type information required for HUS visits for reporting purposes.

columns.name: SOCIAL_SRVC_AREA_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the social care service area for the visit.

columns.name: EXT_LTC_PAT_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether a patient is a long term care patient at an external organization.

columns.name: VETERAN_ENC_MED_CVG_C_NAME
columns.description: This holds the medical coverage level for a given patient encounter. The medical coverage denotes the level of coverage a patient is using for a given encounter. The coverage level determines how much the patient will be billed. This column is frequently used to link to the ZC_VETERAN_MED_CVG table.

columns.name: VETERAN_BILLING_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description: This holds the veteran billing code for a given patient encounter. The billing code denotes the type of appointment that was given which in turns determines how much the patient should be billed. This column is frequently used to link to the ZC_VETERAN_BILLING_CODE table.

columns.name: ED_REF_CALLBAK_D_ID
columns.description: The ID number of the department from which the patient is being referred to the ED.

columns.name: RFV_USED_TO_SCHED_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the reason for visit the user selected to schedule an appointment through MyChart.

columns.name: BMI_PERCENTILE
columns.description: This item stores the patient's BMI percentile. This item will be null for ages greater than 20, and is calculated based on the patient's height, weight, and sex.

columns.name: CREATION_ORD_ID
columns.description: The ID number of the order which created the patient contact.

columns.name: EXT_TX_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: An optional item used to document the encounter's External Transportation Status/Needs. There is no standard functionality that is driven by this item. This item can be used to drive reporting, confirmation errors, or WQ activities.

columns.name: EXT_TX_STATUS_CMT
columns.description: An optional item used to document the encounter's External Transportation Comments. There is no standard functionality that is driven by this item. This item can be used to driver reporting, confirmation errors, or WQ activities.

columns.name: EXT_ACCM_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: An optional item used to document the encounter's External Accommodation Status/Needs. There is no standard functionality that is driven by this item. This item can be used to driver reporting, confirmation errors, or workqueue activities.

columns.name: EXT_ACCM_STATUS_CMT
columns.description: An optional item used to document the encounter's External Accommodation Comments. There is no standard functionality that is driven by this item. This item can be used to driver reporting, confirmation errors, or workqueue activities.

columns.name: GAIL_LIFETIME_RISK
columns.description: This item stores the patient's most recent Gail lifetime risk score from either I EPT 29088 or I EPT 29095.

columns.name: GAIL_5_YR_RISK
columns.description: This item stores the patient's most recent Gail 5-year risk score from either I EPT 29088 or I EPT 29095.

columns.name: SG_AT_RISK_IND_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the at risk indicator for a specific visit.

columns.name: SG_FC_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the financial counselling status for a specific visit.

columns.name: ELIG_PLAN_SELECT_YN
columns.description: This item indicates if an eligibility plan is currently selected for this encounter.

columns.name: SG_MOH_URGENCY_C_NAME
columns.description: Used to indicate whether an appointment is urgent or non-urgent for Ministry of Health regulatory reporting.

columns.name: SG_NAMED_REFERRAL_YN
columns.description: Used for validation of the patient class and regulatory reporting for whether a patient was referred to a particular provider.

columns.name: SG_PAT_REQUEST_YN
columns.description: Used to indicate whether a patient requested to see a particular doctor and thus should be a private patient.

columns.name: SG_TREATMENT_PROG_C_NAME
columns.description: Used to indicate the type of service programme that the appointment is assigned to.

columns.name: SG_APPT_RATIONALE_C_NAME
columns.description: Used to indicate whether an appointment was the earliest possible, at a patient request, at a doctor request, or force booked. This drives regulatory reporting functionality.

columns.name: EVISIT_RFV_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value of the reason for the e-visit. This number links to the value stored in the ON_DEMAND_VIDEO_VISIT_C of the ZC_ON_DEMAND_VIDEO_VISIT table.

columns.name: EVISIT_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether this encounter is an E-Visit. This will be set only for appointment-based E-Visits.

columns.name: EVISIT_TLH_ALLOWED_SUBLOC_C_NAME
columns.description: The sublocation where the patient indicated they were currently located for a video visit or an e-visit. This information comes from a category value stored in I SER 32510.

columns.name: EVISIT_TLH_ALLOWED_LOC_C_NAME
columns.description: The country where the patient indicated they were currently located for a video visit or an e-visit. This information comes from a category value stored in I ECT 70150.
entries: Congo, the Democratic Republic of the
United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland
South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands
Macedonia, the former Yugoslav Republic of
Saint Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha

columns.name: APPT_AUTH_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The authorization status of an appointment based on the information stored in any authorization records linked to an appointment (EPT-23025).

columns.name: EVISIT_NEW_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The current workflow status of an e-visit encounter. Values include 1-In Progress, 2-Submitted, 3-Under Review, 4-Complete, 5-Expired, 6-Returned to Patient, and 7-Cancelled

columns.name: LAB_RESP_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the phlebotomist (EMP) currently responsible for the patient's lab draws for this encounter.

columns.name: LAB_RESP_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: EXT_MEDS_UPD_INST_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Contains the most recent instant of update for external medications in external orders encounters.

columns.name: INTF_PRIMARY_PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: Contains the CSN of the primary interface contact for this encounter.

columns.name: OVERRIDE_BCRA_NUM_BIOPSY_C_NAME
columns.description: The override value for the number of biopsies. The override value is used in the calculation of the Gail model risk score.

columns.name: OVERRIDE_BCRA_RACE_C_NAME
columns.description: The override value for patient race. The override value is used in the calculation of the Gail model risk score.

columns.name: OVERRIDE_GAIL_FACTOR_USER_ID
columns.description: The user who overrode the factors for the Gail model.

columns.name: OVERRIDE_GAIL_FACTOR_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: OVERRIDE_GAIL_FACTOR_DTTM
columns.description: The instant when the Gail factors were overridden.

columns.name: VETERAN_COVERAGE_ENC_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient's encounter is expected to be covered by their VA coverage

columns.name: ADJUD_TO_PHARMACY_COVERAGE_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether we are adjudicating one or more of the medications administered to the patient to a pharmacy coverage. 'Y' indicates that medications will be adjudicated. 'N' or NULL indicate that no medications will be adjudicated to a pharmacy coverage.
